Alas, no. I assume this is from SteamDB, and it only states that Squad have sent out another experimental build.
No, it means expiramentals is being updated.

No. This is more like a code revision or change. SteamDB catalogues all of that. If you want to know if it's out, pay more attention to the forums and the steam client itself. SteamDB is more of a progress checker.

No, they put up a new experimental build about a half hour ago or so (it has 4 uploads - 1 for each version: PC, Mac, Linux, and 64-bit)

Edit: Triple sniped
When was the last time you started ksp up in steam? It's updating your game to 23.5 probably.

I do not use steam so I have no clue.

hence the tittle. I guess I will just erase this post.

-rex
Just keep track of the forums, I expect the whole page to be flooded with posts the instant 0.24 is released
